snippet: Barry Bonds and Roger Clemens will almost certainly not be elected to the Baseball Hall of Fame on Wednesday. But the way writers vote could provide a useful benchmark for how they are handling the steroids issue.
abstract: Barry Bonds and Roger Clemens will almost certainly not be elected to the Baseball Hall of Fame on Wednesday. But the way writers vote could provide a useful benchmark for how they are handling the steroids issue.

headline.main: Suspicion of Steroid Use Could Keep Bagwell and Piazza Out of Hall
